name: Open-Xchange AG
goal: Open-Xchange is the world’s leading provider of open source software-as-a-service solutions for hosting, service provider and telecommunications companies advancing the trust and innovation of the Internet through valued customer engagement models.
interests: Communication, Competition, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Implementation of the GDPR
New proposed ePrivacy Regulation
Regulation of OTTs and of Internet competition, including SWIPO WG
Issues in general related to privacy, digital rights, single digital market, online security and free software
